channel.title: [562] Player Data Variables [562]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm using CorruptionX's 562 Source, and I'm wondering, where are all the player variables stored, not the .xml file, but where does it read out of the source to write 'them' variables, this does make much sence.
Okay, So I'll use the 317 as an example. There is a code in the Client.java, that is something like BufferedReader.Writerorwhatever("kills = ");
Now is that in the 562 source? If it is where is it, I've been searching around for about 20minutes trying to find it, the closest thing if found was XStreamPlayerLOADER, yes I know its loader, but I was looking for clues, so does someone want to help me? Any help is much appresiateddeddedddd, d.
(: - Boots
EDIT.
I fixed it, turns out you have to compile your source -epic facepalm- :/

item.title: [562] Player Data Variables [562]
item.dc:creator: @xBoots xBoots

Hey guys, I’m using CorruptionX’s 562 Source, and I’m wondering, where are all the player variables stored, not the .xml file, but where does it read out of the source to write ‘them’ variables, this does make much sence.

Okay, So I’ll use the 317 as an example.
